DR_PLANT.TITLE: Dr. Plant
DR_PLANT.SUBTITLE: Do you need help with your plants? Dr. Plant is here for you!
DR_PLANT.DESCRIPTION: With our tool, you can identify your plants and receive personalized care recommendations. Simply upload a photo or enter the name of your plant, and we'll tell you everything you need to know: when to water it, how much light it needs, and more. You can also set reminders so you never forget to care for your plants.

DR_PLANT.DIAGNOSIS_HINT_RESULTS: Select the most probable disease for more details.
